description: A batteries-included SQL query & schema builder for Postgres, MySQL and SQLite3 and the Browser
name: knex

scripts.mssql:init: docker-compose -f scripts/mssql-docker-compose.yml up --no-start && docker-compose -f scripts/mssql-docker-compose.yml start
scripts.oracledb:test: docker rmi -f --no-prune knex-test-oracledb && docker build -f scripts/oracle-tests-Dockerfile --tag knex-test-oracledb . && docker run -i -t knex-test-oracledb
scripts.plaintest: mocha -t 10000 -b -R spec test/index.js && npm run tape
scripts.stress:init: docker-compose -f scripts/stress-test/docker-compose.yml up --no-start && docker-compose -f scripts/stress-test/docker-compose.yml start
scripts.test: npm run pre_test && istanbul --config=test/.istanbul.yml cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --check-leaks -t 10000 -b -R spec test/index.js && npm run tape
